Description: Pottery ostracon bearing 4 lines of text containing an Old Nubian alphabet with numeric cryptograms.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr William Yewdale Adams
Bibliographic references: Adams 2002 / Merinarti III: The Late and Terminal Christian Phases (106, pl.34a)
Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (395069) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/395069)
